Docs.summary: The namespace contains the base classes for control adapters and page adapters. You can use these adapters to override the life-cycle states of pages and controls. This is useful if you want to modify a control's markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=fullName> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter> class. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter?displayProperty=fullName> classes inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=fullName> class.
